title.native: デジモンアドベンチャー LAST EVOLUTION 絆

description:
Tai is now a university student, living alone, working hard at school, and working every day, but with his future still undecided. Meanwhile, Matt and others continue to work on Digimon incidents and activities that help people with their partner Digimon. When an unprecedented phenomenon occurs, the DigiDestined discover that when they grow up, their relationship with their partner Digimon will come closer to an end.

As a countdown timer activates on the Digivice, they realize that the more they fight with their partner Digimon, the faster their bond breaks. Will they fight for others and lose their partner? The time to choose and decide is approaching fast. There is a short time before “chosen children” will become adults. This is the last adventure of Tai and Agumon.

(Source: Fathom Events)
synonyms: 数码宝贝大冒险 最后的进化 绊

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Software Development
tags.description: Centers around characters developing or programming a piece of technology, software, gaming, etc.

title.native: デジモンアドベンチャー20th メモリアルストーリー
デジモンアドベンチャー02 THE BEGINNING

alternative: Digimon Kaiser (デジモンカイザー)

name.native: ランズベリー・アーサー

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oja0222digi)

Affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/) since 1987.

[Seki-sensei](https://anilist.co/character/14098/) in [Ojamajo Doremi](https://anilist.co/anime/350/) is named after her.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/中鶴勝祥)

Originating from [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/). Most known for his work in the [Digimon](https://anilist.co/anime/552/) franchise.

He's credited on all relevant media as the creator of the original concept and character designs for the virtual pet franchise, Digimon. However, nothing is known about Hongo as an individual.

The name is actually a pseudonym for the three most important figures in the creation of the Digimon franchise: Aki Maita, one of the two creators of the original Tamagotchi; Hiroshi Izawa, the author of the first Digimon manga; and Takeichi Hongo, the director of marketing for Bandai.

(Source: Digimon Wikia)
Racehorse owner and son of the late [Atsushi Yamatoya](https://anilist.co/staff/200012).

[Website](http://wadakoji.com/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/和田光司)

Kouji Wada was best known for performing several songs for the [Digimon](https://anilist.co/anime/552/) series.

On April 3, 2016, he suddenly passed away due to complications related to nasopharynx cancer.

[Profile (Aoni)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/maeda-ai.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ai_max)

Married to [Ryoutarou Okiayu](https://anilist.co/staff/95177/Ryoutarou-Okiayu)

_Not to be confused with the model and actress [Ai Maeda](https://anilist.co/staff/95647) who has only voiced Kino._

Joseph Maurice Ravel was a French composer, pianist and conductor. He is often associated with impressionism along with his elder contemporary Claude Debussy, although both composers rejected the term. In the 1920s and 1930s Ravel was internationally regarded as France's greatest living composer.
_Note: Not to be confused with Animator [Katsuhiro Takagi](https://anilist.co/staff/140213/Katsuhiro-Takagi)_.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/森下孝三)

The managing director of [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/).
Kenji Watanabe is the chief designer at WiZ Inc. Responsible for designing various monsters and characters from the "Digimon", "Tamagochi", "Magical Witches", and "Yoicocci" series.
He did photography work initally. Also adept in animating.
